work.summary: Building/Designing Secure REST API for cross platform apps. Manage servers and databases in AWS. Building admin portal for SME applications.

projects.name: Coca-Cola Happyshopmate
projects.description:
Loyalty/Rewards App for Coca-Cola.
Build and Designed Scalable Database Architecture. Lead API Developer implementing the RESTful API specification. Developed the Admin portal built in AngularJS. Implemented Security based on PwC compliance

projects.name: PowerTeam
projects.description:
Sports Team Management.
Develop the BackeEnd using ParseJS Framework. Designed and Developed the UI/UX of web application version of the application. Implemented Responsive design.

projects.name: Zukii
projects.description:
Social E-commerce Mobile App.
Consist of server apps for the ecommerce ecosystem from Merchant, Consumer, Logistics and Rider. Lead FrontEnd and BackEnd Developer. Build and Designed Scalable Database Architecture. Built in Laravel Framework (PHP). Setup and manage the server in AWS using ElasticBeanstalk
projects.technologies: PHP, MySql, Laravel, AWS, Docker, Continuous Integration, Continuous Delivery
